sentences.en: Although they're expensive, they last forever and never go out of style.
sentences.cn: 尽管价格昂贵，但它们经久耐用，永不过时。

sentences.en: Buying expensive furniture is not necessarily the smartest move to make.
sentences.cn: 购买昂贵的家具不见得就是最明智之举。

sentences.en: Employing the wrong builder can be a horribly expensive mistake.
sentences.cn: 用错建筑工人有时会是代价高昂的错误。

sentences.en: For low-income families, children’s safety equipment can be prohibitively expensive (= so expensive that most people cannot afford it ).
sentences.cn: 对于低收入家庭来说，儿童的安全设备贵得让人望而却步。

sentences.en: Her husband had expensive tastes (= liked expensive things ).
sentences.cn: 她丈夫喜欢的东西都很贵。

sentences.en: I get very nervous because I'm using a lot of expensive equipment.
sentences.cn: 因为正在使用很多昂贵的设备，所以我非常紧张。

sentences.en: I spend a lot on expensive jewelry and clothing.
sentences.cn: 我花很多钱购买昂贵的首饰和衣服。

sentences.en: It is expensive to buy and a bind to carry home.
sentences.cn: 买这个费用很贵，搬回家也费劲。

sentences.en: Many people are now stuck with expensive fixed-rate mortgages.
sentences.cn: 许多人目前都有高额的定息按揭缠身。

sentences.en: Nuclear plants are expensive to build, though cheap to operate.
sentences.cn: 核电站造价高昂，虽然运转费用低廉。

sentences.en: Petrol is becoming more and more expensive.
sentences.cn: 汽油越来越贵了。

sentences.en: Photography is an expensive hobby.
sentences.cn: 摄影是一项很花钱的业余爱好。

sentences.en: She had decked him out from head to foot in expensive clothes.
sentences.cn: 她用昂贵的服装把他从头到脚打扮一新。

sentences.en: Tape is expensive and loses sound quality every time it is copied.
sentences.cn: 磁带成本高，而且每录制一次音质就会变差一些。

sentences.en: The case against is twofold: too risky and too expensive.
sentences.cn: 反对理由有两点：太冒险而且太昂贵。

sentences.en: the most expensive restaurant in town
sentences.cn: 城里最贵的餐馆

sentences.en: There are restaurants, both humble and expensive, that specialize in them.
sentences.cn: 专门做这些菜的餐馆既有毫不起眼的也有价格昂贵的。

sentences.en: They actually moved down from upstairs because the rent's that expensive.
sentences.cn: 他们确实从楼上搬到了楼下，因为房租太贵了。

sentences.en: They will be slightly more expensive but they last a lot longer.
sentences.cn: 它们的价钱要贵一些，可是更加耐用。

sentences.en: This is fearfully expensive compared with the last one I bought.
sentences.cn: 这和我上次买的相比贵得吓人。

sentences.en: Waterproofed fabric pants are more expensive than plastic pants.
sentences.cn: 防水纤维短裤比塑料短裤贵多了。
